name: Holiday Inn Yuma

reviews.text: We were on a road trip recently, and made it to Yuma! As I am a platinum card holder - hunted out the Holiday Inn - which is difficult as there are no signs once you are off the Freeway! Got a walk-in rate of $99 - plus the obligatory hidden US taxes.(why cant you just include the taxes???) Hotel seems brand new - lovely rooms - spotlessly clean - ours had a microwave and was on the top floor.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Nearby is a brand new shopping centre and cinema complex. When we arrived, we headed over there for a bite to eat. Seemingly like most American hotels, they are right by the freeway! - not much of a view and can be noisy all night. Did not have time to use the nice pool area - headed out of town in the morning!
reviews.title: Great Great Great
Unexpected quality at this price level.
reviews.text: We were on a family vacation and visiting friends in Yuma and were lucky enough to stumble on the Holiday Inn Yuma. What a beautiful new motel. Town was packed because of car shows and other events so the hotel was booked. Beds were comfortable, service was great, staff was friendly. Pool area was nice even though overcrowded one afternoon. I would stay here again in a heartbeat and will if we go down again next winter. Lots of activities and good eating in same area. Also lots of good shopping. Stay here you won't be sorry.

description: The Holiday Inn Yuma Hotel represents the best of both worlds by offering an upscale stay, at a not so upscale price. The Holiday Inn Yuma is a premiere full service non-smoking hotel, only minutes from the Marine Corps Air Station, Yuma Proving Grounds and the new Yuma Palms Mall.The newly built hotel features a restaurant, lounge, meeting and banquet facilities, and a self-serve sundries shop. The Holiday Inn Yuma Hotel boasts a beautiful outdoor swimming pool and hot tub oasis that is suited to both sun worshippers and shade seekers alike. With more travelers wanting to maintain their exercise routines while on the road, the hotel also offers a fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment. When it is time to get down to business, the Holiday Inn allows you to do it without leaving the front doors. The fully equipped business center provides guests with everything they need including a full-size photocopier and two high-speed ready workstations. The meeting rooms also feature a generous pre-function area and come complete with audio-visual equipment. Kem's restaurant and lounge showcases an extensive menu, as well as a comprehensive daily hot breakfast selection, in a cool and comfortable atmosphere. All 121 beautifully decorated rooms are non-smoking and appointed with everything required to ensure your stay will be an enjoyable experience which includes complimentary hi-speed Internet! Holiday Inn, Look Again!
